node.detail_zh: 患者為第 #1049 及 #1052 宗個案患者的孫女，過往健康良好，5 月 11 日開始咳嗽。自祖母出現病徵後轉到外婆家暫住。5 月 2 日及 9 日曾到補習社補習，5 月 9 日在外婆家吃飯，飯聚中十多人全列為緊密接觸者。5 月 10 日與母親到奧海城吃午餐。
node.detail_en: The patient is the (paternal) granddaughter of patients #1049 and #1052, with good past health. She began coughing on May 11 and temporarily moved to her maternal grandmother's home upon her paternal grandmother having developed symptoms. She attended a class at a tutorial centre on May 2 and 9, dined at her maternal grandmother's home on May 9 together with over 10 close contacts. She had lunch with her mother at Olympic City on May 10.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

node.location_zh: 荃灣街市街 10 號卓明樓
node.location_en: Cheuk Ming Building, 10 Tsuen Wan Market Street

node.location_zh: 奧海城二期金滿庭京川滬菜館
node.location_en: Modern China Restaurant, Olympian City II
node.remarks_en: Had lunch with mother at the restaurant

node.location_zh: 沙咀道 289 號恆生荃灣大廈 13 樓日朗坊
node.location_en: Glory Learning House, 13/F,  289 Sha Tsui Road
node.remarks_zh: 5 月 2 日及 9 日曾去補習；1 小時補習班有一名導師及另一名學生上課，課堂期間導師及學生均有戴口罩
node.remarks_en: Attended classes on May 2 & 9, the class was 1 hour with 1 tutor and 2 students

node.location_en: Block 8, Charming Garden, 8 Hoi Ting Road
node.remarks_zh: 患者外婆家；祖母出現病徵後到外婆家暫住；5 月 9 日有 10 多人飯聚
node.remarks_en: Residence of patient's grandmother (mother's side); patient started to stay here since the other grandmother had fever; there was a gathering of over 10 people in the apartment
